msbt.message: ! Today's when we have a serious showdown with the fishies! Now listen. You can't just pull the rod back with all your might. You have to outwit the fish!Of courseI tell myself that, but I end up pulling as hard as I can and the fish swims away, !
In the Fishing Tourney, the more you catch, the more prizes you getIf you're going to go for a prize, you might as well go for the gold fish trophy! That's the aspiration of every angler, !

Paying the entry fee for the Fishing Tourney makes me get serious about it. I'm in full-on visualization mode.After you settled up with C.J., you can just let your muscles take over for a reel workout, !
If you wanna participate in the Fishing Tourney, you have to talk to C.J. in the plaza, OK? Then all you have to do is fish like mad, collect points, and get some swag! I'm pumped now!

I love the competitive tension of catching fish within a time limit!Waiting, your muscles tensedthen the float drops and you pull as hard as your biceps'll let you.You can't beat a flex-off against a fish. But then it's done, and it's on to the next. So good, !
